articles.title: Why some kids are happier right now, and other unexpected effects of quarantine
articles.description: A number of parents are encountering an unexpected response to shelter-in-place rules. Their children seem happier. It helps parents see what was going wrong before the pandemic and gives parents the chance to restructure their lives moving forward.
articles.content:
